name: Autumn Forest (Cactus Spice Studio)
description:
A small atmospheric game about a forest, a hedgehog and a little mafia (maybe not a little)

Before play you need to know:        
- Move on WASD
- To interact press E button
- To switch phrases on dialogue press Space button
- There is some slingshots in bossfight arena, you can use them to defeat bosses
- Projectiles can be parry
- To dash press RMB(dash automatic enables on bossfight)
